text:
Hi,

When trying to run the <copy> task with the following <fileset>

---------------SNIP-----------------------
        <fileset dir="${resin.webapps}/somedir">
                <patternset>
                        <include name="*.jsp"/>
                        <include name="*.html"/>
                        <include name="*.css"/>
                        <include name="**/images/*"/>
                        <include name="**/usermanagement/*"/>
                        <include name="**/planning/*"/>
                        <include name="**/messaging/*">
                        <include name="*/admin/*"/>
                </patternset>
        </fileset>
-----------SNAP-------------------

I get the error

Class org.apache.tools.ant.types.PatternSet$NameEntry doesn't support the nested
"include" element.

According to your documentation on <fileset>/<patternset>, the above should work
(if I'm not mistaken...).

I'm trying to run this on an x86, SuSE Linux 8.1, SUN Java "1.4.1_01" ...
creator: trash@code-sourcery.de

text:
Your need properly closing the <include> tag for pattern **/messaging/*...

Thus the message <include> is not supported within <include>! --DD
creator: ddevienne@lgc.com

text: Should've gone to bed earlier...thanks for your help, this solved my "problem"...
